translations: （Rata）（罗马尼亚、摩尔多瓦）拉塔（人名）

sentences.sentence: If costs go up, there will be a pro rata increase in prices.
sentences.translation: 如果成本增加，价格就会相应上涨。

sentences.sentence: They are paid their salaries and are entitled to fringe benefits on a pro-rata basis.
sentences.translation: 他们领工资，同时还能按比例享受附加福利。
